text: Kevin Ochieng Opondo (born 5 October 1985) is a Kenyan former footballer who played as a midfielder. ==Career== Born in Kajiado, Ochieng played club football for Mathare United, Al-Shabab SC (Seeb), Sofapaka, Gor Mahia, Posta Rangers and Nairobi City Stars. He earned 25 caps for the Kenyan national team, scoring twice. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Kenyan footballers Category:Kenya international footballers Category:Mathare United F.C. players Category:Al-Shabab SC (Seeb) players Category:Sofapaka F.C. players Category:Gor Mahia F.C. players Category:Posta Rangers F.C. players Category:Nairobi City Stars players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Kenyan expatriate footballers Category:Kenyan expatriates in Oman Category:Expatriate footballers in Oman
title: Kevin Ochieng
